about_the_game:
The Closers Rogue Agent Pack is full of all the stuff you need and want when you battle monsters from other dimensions!

The Rogue Agent Pack contains:

  • Dark Command Costume (Full Set)
  • 30-Day Elite Status Voucher ×3—Get the most out of Closers with three months of elite status!
  • 30-Day Maid Service Voucher ×3—Improve your explorations for 90 days.
  • 30-Day Gardening Voucher x3—Increase the number of times you can plant seeds…and get a free Rainbow Seed each day.
  • Operator Costume Set (Full Body + Hair)
  • Transparent Costume Set
  • +1 Gear Booster (not tradeable)
  • +13 Gear Booster—Enhance an item all the way up to +13 in one fell swoop!
  • Awakened Tiamat Pet package—Get your hands on the most powerful pet in Closers!

*Please note that the Operator Costume Set will work for all characters except Bai*
detailed_description:
The Closers Rogue Agent Pack is full of all the stuff you need and want when you battle monsters from other dimensions!

The Rogue Agent Pack contains:

  • Dark Command Costume (Full Set)
  • 30-Day Elite Status Voucher ×3—Get the most out of Closers with three months of elite status!
  • 30-Day Maid Service Voucher ×3—Improve your explorations for 90 days.
  • 30-Day Gardening Voucher x3—Increase the number of times you can plant seeds…and get a free Rainbow Seed each day.
  • Operator Costume Set (Full Body + Hair)
  • Transparent Costume Set
  • +1 Gear Booster (not tradeable)
  • +13 Gear Booster—Enhance an item all the way up to +13 in one fell swoop!
  • Awakened Tiamat Pet package—Get your hands on the most powerful pet in Closers!

*Please note that the Operator Costume Set will work for all characters except Bai*

name: Closers: Rogue Agents Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Closers: Rogue Agent PackThe Rogue Agent Pack contains some of the best Closers gear around, including:Two full costume sets30-Day Elite Status, Maid Service, and Gardening VouchersAwakened Tiamat pet package—the most powerful pet in Closers!and more!*Please note that the Operator Costume Set will work for all characters except Bai*
